content.rendered:
Meet Kristina, the epitome of a modern and talented stylist at Luxe. With a passion for all things hair, Kristina has quickly risen through the ranks, establishing herself as one of our up and coming stars.

Kristina’s expertise lies in her exceptional modern and technical color skills, allowing her to create stunning and personalized looks that enhance each client’s natural beauty. Whether it’s a lived-in blonde, bright blonde’s, or rich brunettes, Kristina’s meticulous attention to detail and innate sense of artistry ensures that each client leaves with a truly remarkable and head-turning result.

In addition to her confidence in colour, Kristina is well-versed in contemporary styling and cutting techniques. She stays up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques, ensuring that her clients receive the most current and fashion-forward cuts.

With Kristina, you can expect a hair styling experience that exceeds your expectations. Whether you’re looking for a bold transformation or a subtle refresh, Kristina’s talent, creativity, and dedication will leave you feeling confident and radiant. Book your appointment with Kristina today and discover the transformative power of her modern and technical colour skills and warm customer service.

Availability: Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday & Saturday.
